description: This solicitation is for the Canada Border Services Agency and is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-200ACS and all terms and conditions of the SA apply. full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 

#### Invitation to Bid

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Security and Access Control Systems for the Toronto Immigration Holding Centre (TIHC)
**Invitation ID:** PR123513 - 1000408175

**Reference Details:**

* **Government Contracting Entity:** Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* **Address:** 355 North River Rd, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Michael Caoagas (Email: [michael.caoagas@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.caoagas@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca), Phone: (289) 795-2540)

**Procurement Summary:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (except Northern Central Region)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Mississauga, ON

**Description of the Requirement:**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking proposals for the provision of a security and access control system for the Toronto Immigration Holding Centre (TIHC). This includes the installation, programming, and testing of all necessary equipment and system components as well as training and support services.

**Requirements:**

* Provision of new card readers and associated equipment and materials for the new addition of the TIHC.
* Installation, programming, and testing of the security and access control system.
* Provisions of necessary training and support services for end-users.

**Value Added Services:**

* Site visit mandatory for bidders.
* Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the names of the person(s) who will attend.

**Submission and Evaluation Process:**

* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website.
* Evaluation criteria will be based on variations or combinations of the above methods.

**Contract Award Information:**

* Contract Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Estimated Contract Value: $ [Insert estimated value]

**Document Information:**

* The full bid solicitation package can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.
